feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -31.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 10:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -31.8°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -35.3°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
